%mdk-data-line={250}
  \begin{align*}
    B_0 &= 1 \\
    B_5 &= P_5 + B_0 = 1 + 1 = 2\\ 
    B_{10} &= P_{10} + B_5 = 1 + 2 = 3\\
    \cdots&\\
    B_{5 n} & = n
  \end{align*}\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

    C_0 &= 1 \\
    C_5 &= P_5 + B_5 = 1 + 1 = 2\\ 
    C_{10} &= P_{10} + B_{10} + C_0 = 1 + 2 + 1 = 4\\
    C_{15} &= P_{15} + B_{15} + C_5 = 1 + 3 + 2 = 6\\

  \end{align*}\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
